MESSAGE.value: Adding jshint with some experimental params
Updating jscs options, and gruntfile accordingly.
Fixing the stupid code typos UGH.
No more manually loading grunt tasks. Now pulls tasks to load dynamically using load-grunt-tasks.

Completed automatic dynamic loading of grunt configuration items, including task definitions and configurations for those tasks. Gruntfile.js and package.json should now only contain Grunt distro-related config information such as directory info, basic Grunt config info, etc. All task-related information should now be stored in the grunt directory in the project root. Updated README.md
Uploading a broken scss config for Keith
Compass just wont work for now. Going to remove it from the distro task and we'll get it working later. Leaving config file in for future use/reference.

-Adding a few new task configurations (sass now will typically replace compass but we'll leave compass just in case somebody wants a base file to use) -Updating directory separators from escaped backslash to forward slash - now works on mac!
